actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the Export-Import Bank of the United States should not grant financial assistance to or on behalf of fertilizer industries owned or controlled by foreign governments.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Export-Import Bank of the United States should not grant financial assistance that would benefit any fertilizer entity owned or controlled by a foreign government.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the Export-Import Bank of the United States should not grant financial assistance to or on behalf of fertilizer industries owned or controlled by foreign governments.
